name: insensate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not aware of what you are doing or what is happening around you: He was virtually insensate after drinking half a bottle of whisky.
not feeling any sympathy for other people's suffering: insensate cruelty/brutality Synonym
unfeeling
having none of the characteristics of life that an animal or plant has: insensate objects like chairs Synonym
inanimate
